1.0.3.en: Added URL to remne's github repository for p1ib

1.0.4.en: Added meter_power.export and description of other capabilities

1.0.5.en: Add power L1, L2 and L3

1.0.7.en: Restore manual device add functionality for Homey Pro 2023

1.0.8.en: Updated p1ib manufacturer name and url

1.0.9.en: Error handling and logging for debugging

1.0.11.en: Support both older and newer versions of p1ib firmware

1.0.12.en: Invert measure_power.export. Hopefully fixes measurement of export value.

1.1.0.en: Support for p1ib (development) firmware 20240625 (f934567) and newer, which has a new obis code format. Please note that this version is NOT compatible with older firmwares!

1.1.1.en: On public demand: Revert previous change that inverted export value

1.1.2.en: Add measure_power.import and change measure_power to report both import and export
